cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_PORT_FOR_S1U to 99999 exceeds the maximum allowed port number, causing network interface configuration failure and preventing proper S1-U communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSymbols to 20 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation failure and preventing proper TDD symbol configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSymbols 設定為 20 超過最大允許值，會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止正確的 TDD 符號配置。
